title: Zendesk Profile Image
body:
Hello all!

Not too long ago with the Zendesk Support and Ticket portion of Riot Support you used to be able to go into your profile and add an image for when you speak with a support member. Is there any way to do this now? I can't find anywhere to edit the settings.

If there is no current way; can one be added?

Many thanks,
Free {{champion:420}}

replies.body: I had to do a little digging for this one, but right now it seems like once that profile image is set it's set for good.
Do you know how to set it? Mines blank at the moment. Or perhaps it's too late?

I wish a had a little better news on that topic =\ . I was actually able to find out a little more info on this and it seems like the way those profile icons worked was changed recently, and there isn't currently a way to change or set those icons.

Aw, not too much of a deal I suppose. Thanks for looking into it for me! 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/valentines_news_image.jpg?itok=wE_6cuJn.png
